TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
Star Trek + Cats? My day has been made!

Just search star trek cat into Google and you will be happy forever!
my cats when theu were kittens

Just search star trek cat into Google and you will be happy forever!

StarCat: Into Meowness.

StarCat: Into Meowness.

I'll take a ticket to that!

Just search star trek cat into Google and you will be happy forever!

So, the second pic I clicked got me over to TvTropes... Whoopsies

So, the second pic I clicked got me over to TvTropes... Whoopsies

Now I have trapped you! Muhahahah!

So, the second pic I clicked got me over to TvTropes... Whoopsies

run for your life!!

Now I have trapped you! Muhahahah!

*sigh* I'm the only sane person on Earth, the whole world is crazy... *battles leon*
'Sokay, I have 20 minutes before I go visit the kittens again...
i miss when my cats were kittens

'Sokay, I have 20 minutes before I go visit the kittens again...

Please can we have pictures of these really cute cats? Please?

And Jedi Master, I am your grandfather, father, brother and son!

Please can we have pictures of these really cute cats? Please?

And Jedi Master, I am your grandfather, father, brother and son!

I will take my camera with me, don't worry. They're not really all that cute, aside from general KITTEN cuteness. They both need a bath...

Please can we have pictures of these really cute cats? Please?

And Jedi Master, I am your grandfather, father, brother and son!

Sometimes it must be used...

I will take my camera with me, don't worry. They're not really all that cute, aside from general KITTEN cuteness. They both need a bath...

Cats are always cute, even if they need a bath

Cats are good that they can clean themselves but bad that they would rip your head of if taken anywhere near a bath.

Edit: I control the worlds brain bleach! No bleach for you Jedi Master!

Cats are always cute, even if they need a bath

Cats are good that they can clean themselves but bad that they would rip your head of if taken anywhere near a bath.

Edit: I control the worlds brain bleach! No bleach for you Jedi Master!

i have adult cats and the worst they can do to me is a slight scratch completely harmless

Cats are always cute, even if they need a bath

Cats are good that they can clean themselves but bad that they would rip your head of if taken anywhere near a bath.

Edit: I control the worlds brain bleach! No bleach for you Jedi Master!

You leave me no choice.

The one time my cat ever needed a bath (skunk, what can I say?), he objected at first, then was very resigned to it. "If you must..."

I still have scars from other occasions, though.

You leave me no choice.

That will not change the fact that I am your entire male side of your family Jedi Master!

One of my cats would kill you if you try and pick him up while the other one you can pick up butis very shy and runs away from me except in the morning.

That will not change the fact that I am your entire male side of your family Jedi Master!

What it WILL do is remove your control of the brain bleach...

What it WILL do is remove your control of the brain bleach...

I am afraid there is no more brain bleach left. I used it all.

The one time my cat ever needed a bath (skunk, what can I say?), he objected at first, then was very resigned to it. "If you must..."

I still have scars from other occasions, though.

See? Cats are the craziest beings in the multiverse. I have bad memories of a black cat I used to own named Madeline...
I was trawling through my Photobucket, looking for kitty pics. None found.

I am afraid there is no more brain bleach left. I used it all.

...

To erase what memory?

trollface.jpg

This was my old kitty, several years ago. My dad built the well for my brother's wedding.

cant see the image can you link to that

Why is it cats seem to be so adapted and evolved to live with humans?

Their entire abilities seem to make us want to love them and take care of them.
